wikipedia_page.main: Colonel Brian Harold Thomson (21 November 1918 – 7 November 2006) was a newspaper proprietor of D. C. Thomson & Co. and soldier in the Fife and Forfar Yeomanry. He was widely known as "Mr Brian" within D. C. Thomson & Co. and throughout the business community of Dundee.

response: *Brian Harold Thomson (1918–2006), British newspaper proprietor for DC Thomson
* Brian Harold Thomson (1918–2006), newspaper proprietor of D. C. Thomson & Co.
